items.title: [Feature] Ensure that users have the option to configure an SSL certificate during the Setup Wizard.
[Bug] Unable to Access Gauzy Desktop UI after Exiting and Relaunching in Integrated Mode
items.description:
**Description:**

**Steps to Reproduce:**
1. Launch Gauzy Desktop App in Integrated Mode.
2. Login and interact with the UI successfully.
3. Exit from the Gauzy Desktop App.
4. Relaunch the Gauzy Desktop App.
5. Observe that only the Timer can be run from the tray, and the full Desktop Gauzy UI is inaccessible.

**Expected Behavior:**

After exiting and relaunching the Gauzy Desktop App in Integrated Mode, users should be able to access the full Desktop Gauzy UI without any issues.

**Actual Behavior:**

Upon relaunching the Gauzy Desktop App, only the Timer can be run from the tray, and the full Desktop Gauzy UI becomes inaccessible.

**Additional Information:**

- Gauzy Desktop App Version: v0.4xx.x
- Operating System: Win10

**Note:**
This issue was reported by user <@U02UW9L88TS> in the Slack conversation [here](https://evereq.slack.com/archives/GL1QGDRD5/p1703710939671149).

items.title: [Feature] Enhancements for SSL Configuration in Setup Wizard
items.description:
**Tasks:**

1. **SSL Certificate Configuration in Setup Wizard:**
   - [ ] #7415
   - [ ]  Include a step in the wizard, as shown in the provided screenshot, for SSL Certificate configuration.
2. **Auto Start on Startup:**
   - [x] #7387
   
   ![image](https://github.com/ever-co/ever-gauzy/assets/45813955/49217fff-c868-47cb-b8a7-319ff5b2b063)

3. **Default "Secure" Setting:**
   - [x]  Enable "Secure" by default, contingent on the SSL certificate being added.
   
![image (1)](https://github.com/ever-co/ever-gauzy/assets/45813955/b0040dd2-b75d-4828-b104-af1b0229c5ab)

4. **Certificate Verification Code:**
   - [ ] Integrate a small piece of code to verify the installation and functionality of the SSL certificate.
   -  [ ] Add a "Check" button (similar to the one for Database Configuration) that performs a GET request to an endpoint associated with the added SSL certificate, providing feedback on whether HTTPS is working.

5. **Hostname Validation for SSL:**
   - [ ]  Implement a validation check to ensure that if "Use SSL" is enabled, users must enter a Hostname (not an IP address) in the "Server Hostname / IP Address" field.
   - [ ] Display an error message when attempting to "Save" with an invalid IP address.

[Slack Message](https://evereq.slack.com/archives/C0306J54BDM/p1703596813396899)

items.title: [Improvement] Conditions to Danger Zone action API's
items.description:
We need to allow users to be able to call following API's in certain conditions, described bellow:

-Remove Team - Active only if the count of managers is 1 and current user is manager
path: `/organization-team/${id}?organizationId=${organizationId}`,
method: "DELETE",

-Quit Team - Current User is manager and length of managers is more than 1 OR current user is not manager
path: `/organization-team-employee/${id}?tenantId=${tenantId}&employeeId=${employeeId}&organizationId=${organizationId}&organizationTeamId=${organizationTeamId}`,
method: 'DELETE',

-Transfer Ownership - Disabled if there are NOT more than 1 manager in the team and current user is manager. I don't think we can implement this one, as it can be used for more than Transfer Ownership, but wanted to share, as what we did in front-end. Also basically we are Unmaking the current user manager, by removing it from managerIds array
path: `/organization-team/${id}`,
method: "PUT",

items.title: [Feature] Export reports into PDF / XLS / Doc and other formats
items.description:
1. Export reports into PDF / XLS / Doc and other formats
2. We want to have a scheduled system that will send reports on daily / weekly / monthly basis (depending on type of report)

items.title: [Review] Investigate Offline Mode Issue During Prolonged API Disconnection
items.description:
### Description

Thorough review of potential issues related to offline mode when there is no connection to the API for an extended period. The goal is to identify and address any unexpected behavior that users may encounter when the application operates without an API connection for an extended duration.
